title: Slope
description: Fast-paced 3D runner where you dodge obstacles and keep your ball from falling off the edge at insane speed.

title: Angry Birds
description: Launch birds with a slingshot to knock down pig towers and bring justice to the stolen eggs!

title: 1v1.LoL
description: A third-person shooter and building simulator where you fight opponents and construct defenses in real time.

title: Bad Parenting
description: A psychological horror game where you face Mr. Red Face and uncover a disturbing truth behind his existence.

title: BitLife
description: Make life choices from birth to death as you shape careers, relationships, and destinies in this life simulator.

title: Basket Random
description: A silly, pixelated basketball game where randomness rules and hilarious moments happen every match.

title: Chiikawa Puzzle
description: Recreate Chiikawa from memory by dragging puzzle pieces into place and see your funny results unfold.

title: Bloxorz
description: Control a rectangular block and roll it onto the target hole without falling off in this tricky puzzle game.

title: Minecraft
description: Explore, build, and survive in a blocky sandbox world full of creativity, danger, and endless adventures.

title: Yume Nikki
description: Explore surreal dream worlds as a reclusive girl, collecting strange effects in this haunting adventure.

title: Learn To Fly
description: Launch your penguin sky-high, upgrade your gear, and soar farther in this fun, physics-based flying game.

title: Granny
description: Escape a creepy house without being caught by Granny using stealth, puzzles, and quick thinking to survive.

title: Cut the Rope
description: Feed candy to Om Nom by cutting ropes and triggering clever chain reactions in this physics puzzle game.

title: Friday Night Funkin'
description: Hit notes on beat to win rap battles and charm your crush in this quirky, rhythm-based music game.

title: Cookie Clicker
description: Click to bake cookies and buy upgrades as your cookie empire grows into an unstoppable production machine.

title: Osu!
description: Click, slide, and spin to the beat in this lightning-fast rhythm game packed with anime-style energy.

title: BLOODMONEY
description: Click to earn money for surgery, but each dollar comes from hurting Harvey in this dark horror clicker.

title: Doki Doki Literature Club
description: A cheerful dating sim that turns into a psychological horror full of twists, glitches, and eerie surprises.

title: Doodle Jump
description: Jump endlessly upward, shoot monsters, and dodge traps as The Doodler in this addictively fun platformer.

title: The Binding of Isaac: Wrath of the Lamb
description: Battle grotesque monsters in a dark, biblical roguelike filled with random dungeons and twisted secrets.

title: Class of ’09
description: A darkly comedic visual novel set in the early 2000s high school scene filled with edgy humor and chaos.

title: Friday Night Funkin vs Shaggy Mod
description: Face off against Shaggy in an intense rhythm showdown full of fast beats and meme energy galore.

title: Friday Night Funkin' Creepypasta Mod
description: Enter a creepypasta-inspired rhythm battle full of eerie songs, spooky visuals, and cursed challenges.

title: Papa's Bakeria
description: Manage a bakery, take orders, and bake perfect pies in this nostalgic and addictive flash classic.

title: Papa's Burgeria
description: Grill burgers, stack toppings, and keep customers happy in this beloved time-management flash game.

title: Papa's Cheeseria
description: Cook cheesy sandwiches to perfection and manage orders efficiently in this fan-favorite flash title.

title: Papa's Cupcakeria
description: Bake, frost, and decorate cupcakes for picky customers in this sweet and colorful flash experience.

title: Papa's Donuteria
description: Fry, fill, and decorate donuts while managing orders and upgrades in this satisfying flash classic.

title: Papa's Freezeria
description: Blend and top frozen treats while running your seaside ice cream shop in this nostalgic flash hit.

title: Papa's Hot Doggeria
description: Grill hot dogs, add toppings, and keep fans fed at the ballpark in this fun flash restaurant game.

title: Papa's Pancakeria
description: Stack pancakes, pour syrup, and serve delicious breakfasts to customers in this cozy flash game.

title: Papa's Pastaria
description: Boil pasta, make sauce, and serve up perfect plates of Italian dishes in this restaurant sim classic.

title: Papa's Pizzaria
description: Top, bake, and cut pizzas to perfection for demanding customers in this nostalgic flash cooking game.

title: Papa's Scooperia
description: Scoop cookie dough and ice cream to build tasty desserts while keeping your customers satisfied.

title: Papa's Sushiria
description: Roll sushi, pour tea, and impress your hungry guests in this charming flash restaurant management game.

title: Papa's Taco Mia
description: Cook, fill, and wrap tacos for customers in this fast-paced, food-filled classic flash restaurant sim.

title: Papa's Wingeria
description: Fry chicken wings, add sauces, and serve them with style in this fun and nostalgic flash cooking game.

title: Lacey's Flash Games
description: Play as Lacey exploring a cheerful kids’ website that hides disturbing secrets beneath its surface.

title: Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy
description: Use a hammer to climb mountains of junk and test your patience in this brutally frustrating game.

title: Plants vs Zombies
description: Grow plants and use their powers to defend your home from endless waves of silly but deadly zombies.

title: Pokemon Emerald
description: Relive a classic Pokémon journey, catching creatures and battling trainers across the Hoenn region.

title: Pokemon Red
description: Experience the original Pokémon adventure and become a champion by catching and training powerful teams.

title: Pou
description: Feed, clean, and care for your alien pet Pou while dressing it up with fun outfits and accessories.

title: Slender: The 8 Pages
description: Explore the dark woods, collect all eight pages, and avoid the terrifying Slenderman lurking nearby.

title: Snowbattle.io
description: Roll giant snowballs, throw them at enemies, and dominate the icy arena in this chaotic winter brawler.

title: Amanda the Adventurer
description: Watch old kids’ show tapes that twist into terrifying experiences as Amanda reveals dark secrets on screen.

title: Andy's Apple Farm
description: Play as Andy exploring a retro farm game that slowly unravels into eerie glitches and hidden horrors beneath the cheerful surface.

title: Bendy and the Ink Machine
description: Explore a deserted animation studio where ink comes to life and uncover the dark secrets behind its cartoon creations.

title: DELTARUNE
description: Embark on a strange journey with Kris, Susie, and Ralsei through a dark world filled with charm, danger, and heartfelt choices.

title: Hotline Miami
description: Slash and shoot your way through neon-soaked levels filled with brutal combat, surreal storytelling, and relentless synthwave energy.

title: Kindergarten 1
description: Navigate a twisted elementary school full of dark humor, deadly secrets, and bizarre characters in this disturbing adventure.

title: Kindergarten 2
description: Return for another chaotic school day packed with new students, twisted missions, and even darker secrets to uncover.

title: Hungry Pumpkin
description: Serve food to a demanding pumpkin who only eats what he wants in this weirdly addictive retro flash classic.
